name: THE WORST GARDEN
description:
3D isometric shooter developed in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2023 with the theme of "Roots". Face a variety of rogue animals in a boss-rush bullet hell where you can only attack when you root yourself to the ground.

Controls:

-Move with WASD

-Hold shift to root yourself

-Aim with the mouse when rooted to aim

-Shoot with Left Click when rooted
